alert.note: Alert for Duval; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 1:30PM EST until November 30 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. JOHNS AND SOUTHEASTERN DUVAL COUNTIES... At 130 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bayard, or 7 miles east of Fruit Cove, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ponte Vedra Beach, Fruit Cove, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, Nocatee, Bayard and Durbin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
